name: Diving - Diving with and without scuba gear - pressure layer from the WIO Symphony tool
description: A kernel density model of all dive centers registered within OpenStreetMaps was used, applying a kernel density radius of 10 km. Known limitations: This layer assumes that the number of dive centres is proportional to diving activities and does not take into account the size or popularity of the diving centres.

citation: Sacre E (2022). Diving - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool. URL: https://github.com/WIOSymphony/
